name: Baby Sitter
quote: "$6.75 an hour and unlimited fridge privileges is not worth DYING FOR!"
abilities: Gains +2 Defense from each 'Young' Character in the same Movie.
title: Night

name: Janitor
quote: "You wouldn't believe the things some people throw away..."
abilities: Pay 2 Popcorn to take any Prop out of the Graveyard and give it to the Janitor for free. The Janitor has no Prop limit.
title: House

name: Stoner
quote: "Dave's not here, man..."
abilities: May be played into an Opponent's Movie.
title: Fearsome

name: Roll The Credits 1
quote: "Keep watching the skies..."
title: Beach

name: Roll The Credits 2
quote: "Look! Sunlight! We made it!"
title: Blood

name: Roll The Credits 3
quote: "The end... or is it? But..."
title: Lizard

name: Roll The Credits 4
quote: "The bad guy's dead and none of this blood is mine, so it must be over..."
title: Supernatural

name: Sewer
quote: "It's moments like this that I think I have to reexamine my lifestyle choices..."
abilities: 'Subterranean' Attacks always succeed in the Sewer.
title: Grasp

name: Basement
quote: "Hmm, I wonder what's down here..."
abilities: The Basement can't stand on its own; it must be Combined with another Location. Defense = -1 during 'Psycho' Attacks.
title: Invisible

name: Fun House
quote: "Doot-do-do-do-do Doot-do-do-do."
abilities: On your turn, you may pay 3 Popcorn to swap one of your Characters (with their attached cards) for another Player's (with their attached cards).
title: Carnival

name: Old Pickup Truck
quote: "Who's got the keys?" "Billy." "Aaaaand would this be Billy's severed head in the toilet?"
abilities: Any time your Movie loses one or more Props to the Graveyard, you may give one of them to the owner of the Pickup.
title: Satan

name: Explosives
quote: "EAT THIS!!!"
abilities: Discard Explosives during an Attack to give your Movie +15 Defense until the attack is over.
title: Atomic

name: High Heels
quote: "Three days in a remote cabin and THESE are the shoes she wears?"
abilities: Can be played on an Opponent's Character.
title: Moon

name: Flamethrower
quote: "Now we're cooking with heat!"
abilities: Works against Swarm attacks.
title: Man

name: Editing Room Floor
quote: "But I swear, I'm in this movie!"
abilities: Remove any one card from any Movie. It is discarded.
title: Werewolf

name: Gotcha!
quote: "Oh look, the old 'fist out of the fresh grave' trick."
abilities: Stop a Roll the Credits card from ending the game. It is discarded.
title: Giant

name:
Hey, What's Behind
This Door?
quote: "It's a fine line between stupid and clever."
abilities: Kill one Character who is either 'Smart' or 'Dumb'.
title: Vixen

name: It Was Only a Dream
quote: "And you were there, and you were there..."
abilities: Stop one Attack. The Creature is discarded.
title: Die

name: Over Budget
quote: "First day of filming and we're already out of money? You are SO fired!"
abilities: Stop one Special Effect card as it's being played. It is discarded.
title: Nextdoor

name: Production Value
quote: "It's the cleavage. Monsters are distracted by cleavage."
abilities: Attach this card to a 'Female' Character. She gains +2 Defense.
title: Claws

name: Pyrotechnics
quote: "The good news is that the zombies are afraid of fire. The bad news is I just dropped the torch on those oily rags over there..."
abilities: Destroy a Location. For each extra Popcorn you spend, kill one Character in that Movie.
title: Escape

name: Relentless
quote: Ch-ch-ch-ch! Ah-ah-ah-ah!
abilities: Play after a successful Attack. You may immediately attack any Movie with that Creature again for no extra cost.
title: Mummy

name: Run Away!!!!
quote: "It's harder to kill a moving target!"
abilities: Give the Defender +5 Defense for the current Attack.
title: Caged

name: The Money Shot
quote: "This is it. THIS is the one I'll be remembered for!"
abilities: Triple the strength of the current Attack.
title: Tale

name: The Stars Are Right
quote: "The Prophesy! The time of darkness draws near!"
abilities: Double the current strength of a Creature Attack and give it the trait 'Supernatural'.
title: They

name: They Found the Fusebox
quote: "Oh great, he ate the light!"
abilities: Attach to a Location. That Location's Defense = -15. Discard from play if the Flashlight is in the same movie.
title: Keep

name: Three Picture Deal
quote: "Somebody has to survive for the sequel."
abilities: Attach this card to a Character to prevent them from being killed (no new Character may be chosen). They can no longer be targeted by Creatures from now on.
title: Alive

name: Underground Monsters
quote: "They're under the ground! They're under the gall-darned ground!"
abilities: Add +2 to the current Attack or double it if it has the Trait 'Monster'.
title: Children

name: Amphibious
quote: "Kiss it on the snout. Maybe it will turn into a prince." "Sure, a giant rampaging prince!"
abilities: Triple the strength of the current 'Aquatic' Attack. Even though it is 'Aquatic', it can still target a Movie with a non-'Aquatic' Location.
title: Bloodthirsty

name: To Be Continued...
quote: "So it just stops and we have to wait a year for the ending? Somebody kill the director!"
abilities: Stop a Roll The Credits card from ending the game. It is discarded.
title: Frankenstein

name: Studio Interference
quote: "We have some notes..."
abilities: Pick any Player. They discard their entire hand and draw an equal number of new cards.
title: Castle

name: Industry Legend
quote: "He must have lost a bet to be starring in this..."
abilities: Attach to a Character. That Character gains +2 Defense.
title: Nightmare

name: Chivalrous But Dumb
quote: "Does this mean I'm not getting any?"
abilities: Sacrifice one of your 'Male' Characters to prevent one of your 'Female' Characters from being killed.
title: Killer

name:
And They Were
the Killers All Along!
quote: "We all go a little mad sometimes..."
abilities: Starting next turn, on your turn if you have more than one Character that can be played as a Psycho attack cast in your Movie, you may bank this Twist. Any such Character you control may be played as if they were a Psycho attack once per turn for their normal Popcorn cost. They return to your Movie afterwards, regardless of how the attack resolves.
title: Screaming

name:
And They Were Dead
All Along!
quote: "I see dead people..."
abilities: Starting next turn, on your turn, if you have exactly three Characters in your Movie, one 'Young', one 'Female', and one 'Male', you may discard the 'Male' Character and bank this Twist.
title: Sense

name: The Final Girl
quote: "I got you, you son of a...!"
abilities: If you only have one Character in your Movie, they are 'Female', and your Movie is being attacked, you may stop the attack and bank this Twist. This may only be banked as the final Plot Twist, and cannot be banked if an Opponent has an 'Alien' in play.
title: Girl

name: Seen It Before
quote: "This movie's my favorite, I've watched it, like, a thousand times-- Oh wait! Here comes the boom drop... "
abilities: You may peek at one of your Opponent's face-down Plot Twists.
title: On DVD

name: And It Won't Start!
quote: "No, no-no-no-no! C'mon c'mon!"
abilities: Starting next turn, you may discard a 'Vehicle' in your Movie to bank this Twist. Until the end of the Movie, your Location may not be changed or added to. (But it can be destroyed or discarded.)
title: Engine

name:
And They Were Slowly
Dying All Along!
quote: "Ahhh, so that's why they kept coughing up blood..."
abilities: Starting next turn, on your turn you may reveal this Twist and attach it to one of your Characters. If they are still cast in your Movie by the end of your next turn, remove them and all their attached cards from play. Place those cards under this Twist and bank their total Defense.
title: Blood

name:
And They Were Secretly
The Monster All Along!
quote: "I just wanted to protect you from yourselves by scaring the living daylights out of you is all..."
abilities: When this card is placed face down, put a 'Large' Character from your hand face down under it. The next time there is an unsuccessful attack against your Movie, you may bank this Twist and play that Character in your Movie for free.
title: Scared

name: The Old Switcheroo!
quote: "Oh crap! They were twins!"
abilities: Starting next turn, if you and an Opponent each have a Character with the same Defense and the same gender, you may bank this Twist. Those two Characters exchange all of their attached cards and are swapped between their Movies while remaining in play.
title: Twins

name: But They Were Expecting Them!
quote: "We just need to pick up a few things first..."
abilities: When your Movie is attacked, you may reveal this Twist. The attack stops and the Creature is placed on top of it. At the beginning of the attacking Opponent's next turn, after they fill up, the attack immediately begins again. You may bank this Twist if the Creature is defeated, otherwise it is discarded.
title: Surprise

name: And It Burst From Their Chest!
quote: "And I just thought he was having some heartburn!"
abilities: When this card is placed face-down, put an 'Alien' Creature face down under it. Starting next turn, on your turnyou may bank this Twist by killing one of your Characters.If you do, you may immediately attack an Opponent of your choice with the 'Alien' for free with a bonus of twice the Defense of the sacrificed Character.
title: Burst

name: The Last Man
quote: "Somebody had a cookout here, Vince."
abilities: Starting next turn, if you only have one Character in your Movie, they are 'Male', and your Movie is being attacked, you may stop the attack and bank this Twist. This may only be banked as the final Plot Twist, and cannot be banked if an Opponent has a 'Cop' in play.
title: Lives

name: DMCA Smackdown
quote: "It's not a light saber! That would be a copyright infringement. It's a sonic spirit blade!" "Right..."
abilities: You may place any one card an Opponent has in play into your hand provided that you can reveal a copy of it in your own hand, Movie, Graveyard, or deck. (If from the latter, be sure to replace it and shuffle.)
title: Copy

name:
And They Ended Up
Back Where it All Started...
quote: "... we have to go back... to the mansion!"
abilities: You may bank this Twist if you have at least two Locations in your Graveyard. When you do, discard your current Location and replace it with the first Location your Movie was set in.
title: Backwards

name:
And Then They Woke Up
Elsewhere!
quote: "--Gah! Wait... How'd I end up here?"
abilities: When this card is placed face-down, put a Location face down under it. If your Movie is attacked successfully, after your Opponent chooses which Character to kill you may bank this twist. Replace your current Location with the one under the Twist, and the Character survives.
title: Awake

name: Military Vehicle
quote: "4-wheel drive, bullet-proof plating... and 36 cup holders!"
abilities: A Character with the Military Vehicle can be given any number of 'Weapon' Props in a single turn.
title: Crushed
